entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
